    @allure.story("邀请码为空测试")
    @allure.title("测试邀请码为空")
    def test_register_missing_invitation_code(self, driver, base_url):
        """测试邀请码为空"""
        with allure.step("创建注册页面对象"):
            register_page = RegisterPage(driver)
    
        with allure.step(f"导航到注册页面 {base_url}"):
            register_page.navigate_to(base_url)
            register_page.wait_for_page_load()
    
        with allure.step("生成测试数据"):
            username = self.generate_random_username()
    
        with allure.step("填写表单（不填邀请码）"):
            register_page.set_username(username)
            register_page.set_password("Test@123")
            register_page.set_confirm_password("Test@123")
            # 故意不设置邀请码
            register_page.click_register()
    
        with allure.step("验证注册失败"):
